title: Hola | Learn Why VPN Providers Are Shutting Down in India. Any suggestions for VPN?
selftext: As the title suggested Hola and VPN provider like Nord also removed it's servers from India. This is last year news and seriously I didn't know about it. I was not using any type of VPN for some time so I don't know this had happened. So are you guys still using any type of VPN and how's your experience with it.
comments: Hola among the worst vpn providers should shut down for good everywhere
You can use TOR. It's available on Android too
I use surfshark but these days they ask for pan card and local address details when you make the purchase.
They are just shutting down servers in India you can still connect to singapore and others
